$ How We Build

Tools change. Principles don't.

Technology Stack Overview

$ Backend Languages

Multi-language approach: Python for rapid iteration, C for performance-critical paths, Java for enterprise, Go for microservices

PythonPrimary backend language. FastAPI, Flask, Django
C / C++Performance-critical: trading systems, embedded control
JavaEnterprise: Spring Boot, JVM ecosystems
GoMicroservices: high-throughput APIs
RustSystems programming: memory safety, zero-cost abstractions

$ AI / ML

Production ML frameworks with observability and version control

PyTorchDeep learning for research and production
LangChainLLM orchestration with RAG pipelines
CrewAIMulti-agent systems with task delegation
AgnoAI orchestration and workflow management
OllamaLocal LLM deployment, privacy-first
HuggingFaceModel hub, transformers, inference

$ Frontend & Mobile

Web frameworks and cross-platform mobile development

Next.jsReact framework with SSR, production-ready
ReactComponent-based UI library
TypeScriptType-safe JavaScript at scale
FlutterCross-platform mobile: iOS, Android

$ Automation & Hardware

Industrial automation, robotics, embedded systems, and IoT

PLC ProgrammingLadder logic, structured text for industrial control
ROSRobot Operating System for autonomous systems
SCADASupervisory control and data acquisition
Modbus / OPC-UAIndustrial communication protocols
Embedded CARM, ESP32, real-time systems
CAD ToolsDesign and simulation for mechatronics

$ Infrastructure

Cloud platforms, containerization, orchestration, and deployment

AWSCloud services, EC2, Lambda, S3
DockerContainerization for reproducible deployments
KubernetesContainer orchestration at scale
LinuxProduction OS: Ubuntu, CentOS
TerraformInfrastructure as code

$ Data & Testing

Databases, data processing, and testing frameworks

PostgreSQLRelational database, production workloads
RedisIn-memory cache, pub/sub, real-time
KafkaEvent streaming, microservices messaging
SQLiteLightweight embedded database
MongoDBNoSQL document database
Pytest / JestTesting frameworks with coverage
Load TestingPerformance and stress testing tools
